altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: リエコミ

description.en: A series depicting a new side of the Liella! members serialized in Love Live Days

altTitles.ja: 履いてください、鷹峰さん

description.en:
Takamine Takane is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president sits at the top of the social pyramid. And then there's Shirota Koushi, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects to speak of. One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san's naked breasts and finds out the secret behind her unbelievable success. From then on, his school life changes.

“Become my closet!”

Shirota is forced into underwear-putting-on servitude!?
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/please-put-them-on-takamine-san)
description.ja: 生徒会長の鷹峰さんはスクールカーストのトップ中のトップ、神！　対して、友達も存在感も皆無の白田くんはある日、鷹峰さんの生おっぱいを見てしまう。そこから変わるスクールライフ。――「私にパンツを履かせなさい」なんと鷹峰さんは”未だ穢れ知らぬ乙女（エターナル・バージンロード）”という能力でパンツを脱いで時をかける少女だった。ノーパンではいられない鷹峰さんのクローゼットとして白田くんは鷹峰さんにモモ色おねだりをされ続けるハメに…。
description.ru:
Президент студсовета, Такамине-сан находится на самом верху школьной иерархии. Она — практически бог!  
Однажды Широта-кун случайно увидел обнажённую грудь Такамине. С того момента его школьная жизнь изменилась.  
- "Надень мои трусики для меня"   
В итоге Широта-кун оказался в стеснительном положении из-за розовых пристрастий Такамине-сан.  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuichi_hiiragi)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/2056601)  
- [Official Page (JP)](https://magazine.jp.square-enix.com/joker/series/takamine/)
description.pt-br:
A presidente do conselho estudantil, Takamine-san, está no topo da hierarquia escolar, uma deusa! Um dia, Shirota-kun acidentalmente vê os seios nus de Takamine-san. A partir de então, sua vida escolar mudou, sendo chantageado para uma vida de servidão a Takamine-san. ― “Coloque minha calcinha para mim”
Shirota-kun acabou em uma situação difícil devido aos favores cor-de-rosa de Takamine-san.

title.en: Starting From Today I'll Work as a City Lord

altTitles.en: Become the Castellan in Another World

altTitles.ru: С сегодняшнего дня я лорд города

description.en:
When a gaming otaku gains the power to cross over to other worlds, he will obviously have to figure out what to do with it! But what is this?! A domineering cat-woman elder sister, a loli fox-woman, a cuddly rabbit-woman younger sister… This isn't a zoo! Welcome to a world where the strong prey on the weak. Then again, it's all so wonderful! An authentic strategy game, a huge conspiracy crisis, this other world's hegemony is now loading, all waiting for thou scum…  


---
description.fr: Venez découvrir comment un otaku deviens le Lord d'une ville.

title.en: She Has Become a Distant Existence

altTitles.ja: 遠い存在になった幼馴染
遠い存在となった彼女は…

altTitles.ja-ro: Tooi Sonzai to Natta Kanojo wa…

description.en: Once she was his childhood friend who used to hang out with him all the time. Now she's a nationally recognized idol on television who still hangs out with him all the time. An existence so far away, its in another reality!

altTitles.ja: はりあう妻と犬

description.en: A story about a wife who loves her husband and her dog fighting over his love.
description.ja: 夫大好きな妻と犬が夫の愛を奪い合う話.

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

altTitles.ja: ダヴルの王冠

description.en: The setting is a church in Japan. The main character is Rui, the strongest former hitman. It's a violence and comedy about a group of hitmen protected by the church!

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…

title.en: Attack on Titan - Not a Love Song (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja-ro: Shingeki no Kyojin - Not a Love Song (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 進撃の巨人 - Not a Love Song (Doujinshi)

description.en:
Pairing: Levi x Eren

A story about trust between Captain Levi and Eren.

Prequel to *Egoist*.

altTitles.ja: 進撃の巨人 - Egoist (Doujinshi)

description.en:
Pairing: Levi x Eren

Eren returns to normal after being retrained but loses all memory of what happened when he was in confinement. Will this story ultimately get a happy ending?

Sequel to *Not A Love Song*.

The arrogant and cold Yu Xingji, the leader of the Twelve constellation deities, traded his memories in exchange for reincarnating a thousand times in order to find his true love. During his 1001st reincarnation, he's reborn into the life of a college professor, where he meets Qin Ling, an aloof young man in possession of strange spiritual powers. When a strange event suddenly happens on the school campus, Yu Xingji couldn’t help but find himself standing in front of Qin Ling to protect him during the most critical moment!While the relentless reincarnation cycles may have erased the memories and appearance of his lover, only the emotions carved in his bones and engraved in the heart will guide them to reunite once again.

title.en: RTA Sousha wa Game Sekai kara Kaerenai

altTitles.ja: RTA走者はゲーム世界から帰れない

altTitles.en: Speedrunner Cannot Return from the Game World
RTA Runner Cannot Return from the Game World
The RTA Runner Can't Return From The Game World

altTitles.ja-ro: RTA Sousha ha Game Sekai kara Kaerenai

description.en: Our protagonist, the speedrunning emperor of *Another Verse*, suddenly feels sleepy in the middle of practice. When he awakens, the familiar opening of *Another Verse* is playing right before his eyes!? In this godly environment where his body is moving better than usual, he has to speedrun! Clearing the game world faster than anyone! Abusing bugs to fight, the fastest isekai fantasy!!
description.ja:
「アナザーバース」RTA世界王者である主人公は、練習中に急に眠気に襲われてしまう。
目を覚ますと目の前には見慣れた「アナザーバース」のオープニングが――!?
いつもより体が動くこの神環境なら、RTAするしかない！

ゲームの世界を誰よりも早くクリアせよ！
バグ技を駆使して戦う、”””最速”””の異世界ファンタジー!!

description.en:
Gamin Yoon, a 17 year old student, goes to a school known to harbor future criminals. Stuck in a carnivorous environment where only the strongest survive, he struggles to get good grades to enter a 4 year university. But, will he be able to study well enough to enter university, or will he get involved in the unending fights around the school?  


---

[Official Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/CAMPUS/pizixueba/list?title_no=1467)

altTitles.en: Possibly the Greatest Alchemist of All Time

altTitles.ja: いずれ最強の錬金術師?

altTitles.en: Someday Will I Be the Greatest Alchemist?

description.en:
Not even a hero, Takumi Iruma gets accidentally mixed in with a group of heroes chosen to be summoned to another world. As compensation for the mix-up, a goddess offers him the right to choose any skill he wishes for! Hoping for a peaceful and quiet life that has nothing to do with fighting or going into battle, he chooses a seemingly boring creation skill. However, it turns out "alchemy" is the most powerful skill that allows him to create everything from a holy sword to flying ships! This cheat skill he unexpectedly acquired turns him into a wealthy merchant and makes him undefeatable in battles! A heartwarming adventure story about (possibly) the most powerful alchemist in another world!

*Alpha Manga*

---

*Alternate description:*

Iruma Takumi, a 40-year old salary man, was dragged into a hero summoning just like in a template. What was his fate? The Goddess sent him and the heroes to the other world separately.  
  
With the Goddess’ overprotective support, he landed in a different world looking handsome, rejuvenated, and quite different from a Japanese.  
  
Although he wanted a slow life while working in the manufacturing trade, that was not permitted by the Goddess’ special body and abilities.  
  
Would Takumi be able to live a peaceful life in a different world?

altTitles.ja: 推しの子

altTitles.th: 【เกิดใหม่เป็นลูกโอชิ】

altTitles.ja: 【推しの子】

altTitles.pt-br: Oshi no Ko - Minha Estrela Preferida

description.el:
H Άι Χόσινο είναι ένα ανερχώμενο μουσικό είδωλο, η οποία ανακοίνωσε ξαφνικά οτι θα πάρει ενα διάλειμμα από το μουσικό της γκρουπ, Μπι-Κομάτσι, για λόγους υγείας. Προς εκπλήξη ενός από τους μεγαλύτερους θαυμάστες της, του γυναικολόγου Γκόρο Αμεμίγια, μια μέρα η νεαρή Αϊ εμφανίστηκε στο νοσοκομείο οπού δουλεύει. Ο Γκόρο έρχοντας πλεον πρόσωπο με πρόσωπο με την αδυναμία του, τρέμει στο γεγονός ότι η 16-χρονη Αϊ είναι έγκυος... με δίδυμα με τον πατέρα άφαντο. Αποφασισμένη να αποκτήσει την δικιά της οικογένεια και να συνεχίσει την δουλεία της ως είδωλο, έχει σκοπο να κρατήσει την γέννα των παιδιών της μυστικο, μαζί με την βοήθεια του Γκόρο.

Το δυνατότερο όπλο ενός ειδώλου ειναι τα ψέματα.
Μια ίστορια μυστηρίου και εξαπάτησης, όπου η σκοτεινή πλευρά της σόου-μπιζ αποκαλύπτεται κάτω από τις στρώσεις ψεμάτων και εκμεταλεύσεων.
description.en:
The story begins with a beautiful girl, her perfectly fake smile, and the people who love her selfishly for it.  
  
What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?
description.es:
'Oshi no Ko' explora la vida de una abrumadoramente hermosa heroína y muestra la industria del entretenimiento desde un punto de vista nunca antes visto.

- [Wikipedia](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.fa: آی هوشینو ۱۶ ساله یک آیدول با استعداد و زیباست که هواداران زیادی داره؛اون نماد پاکیه، ولی ظاهر با باطن قضیه متفاوته. گورو هوندا یک پزشک زنان که ساکن حومه‌ی شهره که یکی از طرفداران بزرگ آی هستش، ولی ناگهان آیدول مورد علاقه خودش رو ملاقات میکنه و متوجه میشه که اون بارداره، گورو به اون قول میده که بچش رو سالم بدنیا بیاره، ولی اون نمیدونست که این ملاقات باعث عوض شدن زندگیش میشه.
description.fr:
L'histoire commence avec une belle fille, son sourire parfaitement faux, et les gens qui l'aiment égoïstement pour cela. Que se passe-t-il dans les coulisses de la brillante industrie du showbiz? Jusqu'où iriez-vous pour votre idole bien-aimée ? Que feriez-vous si vous découvriez que la réincarnation est réelle? La star du spectacle est Aquamarine Hoshino et la scène n'est qu'une simple façade. Parviendra-t-il à atteindre le point culminant avant que le monde du glamour ne l'avale tout entier?  


---

- [Nominated for the 14th annual Manga Taisho awards.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-01-24/14th-manga-taisho-awards-nominate-10-titles/.168759)

- [Wikipedia](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_ko)
description.ja: 「この芸能界（せかい）において嘘は武器だ」　地方都市で、産婦人科医として働くゴロー。芸能界とは無縁の日々。一方、彼の“推し”のアイドル・星野アイは、スターダムを上り始めていた。そんな二人が“最悪”の出会いを果たし、運命が動き出す…!?
description.ru:
Что, если бы дорога в шоу-бизнес была открыта для тебя с самого начала?  
Новая серия оригинальной манги от двух известных авторов — Акасака Ака («Госпожа Кагуя: в любви как на войне») и Ёкояри Мэнго («Тайные желания отвергнутых»). Это совершенно новая работа, в которой мир шоу-бизнеса предстаёт перед читателями в очень необычном свете: у лидера идол-группы Хосино Аи есть секрет, о котором никто не должен знать…  


---
- [Wikipedia](https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.vi:
Câu chuyện khởi đầu với sự xuất hiện của một cô gái xinh đẹp, mang nụ cười giả tạo hoàn hảo, và có những người yêu cô ấy một cách ích kỷ bất chấp điều đó.

Điều gì diễn ra đằng sau ánh hào quang của thế giới showbiz? Con người ta sẽ làm đến mức nào vì thần tượng yêu quý của mình? Bạn sẽ làm gì nếu phát hiện ra luân hồi chuyển kiếp là có thật? Nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Aquamarine Hoshino liệu có hoàn thành được khát vọng báo thù trước khi bị thế giới hào nhoáng ấy nuốt trọn? Hãy cùng đón xem bộ truyện được sáng tác bởi bộ đôi tác giả của Kaguya-sama và Kuzu no Honkai.
description.es-la:
La historia comienza con una hermosa chica, su sonrisa perfectamente falsa y la gente que la ama con egoísmo gracias a eso.
  
¿Qué ocurre detrás de la brillante industria del espectáculo? ¿Hasta dónde llegarías por el bien de tu ídolo? ¿Qué harías si descubrieras que la reencarnación es real? La estrella del espectáculo es Aquamarine Hoshino, y el escenario no es más que una mera fachada. ¿Conseguirá llegar al clímax antes de que el mundo del espectáculo se lo trague por completo?
description.pt-br: Doutor Goro é obstetra em um hospital do interior e se encontra longe do mundo em que brilha e evolui Aï Hoshino, uma cantora de sucesso crescente da qual é fã absoluto. O que ele ainda não sabe é que sem mais nem menos ele se encontrará com sua idol favorita em uma circunstância um pouco fora do normal. Terá ele tempo suficiente para ficar perto dela ou o mundo irá girar de maneira cruel para ele? Essa é uma história sobre o mundo do entretenimento japonês.

title.en: Ani no Yome to Kurashite Imasu.

altTitles.th: เมื่อรักของฉันและเธอเริ่มผลิบาน

altTitles.ja: 兄の嫁と暮らしています。

description.de: Seit dem Tod ihres Bruders, lebt die 17-jährige Shino Kishibe mit der Witwe Ehefrau ihres Bruders, Nozomi. Nozomi möchte ein Person sein, an die sich Shino anlehnen kann, während Shino entschlossen dazu ist, ihr keine Bürde zu sein. Zusammen versuchen die verwaiste Oberschülerin und die junge Witwe sich gegenseitig zu unterstützen, während ihre Leben normal weitergehen.
description.en:
Since the death of her brother, seventeen year-old Shino Kishibe has been living with her sister-in-law Nozomi. Nozomi wants to be a person Shino can lean on, while Shino is determined not to be a burden. Together the orphaned high-schooler and young widow try to support one another while carrying on with their everyday lives.  
  


---
description.fr: Après la mort de son frère, Shino Kishibe doit vivre avec sa belle-soeur, Nozomi. Ensemble, elles apprendront à communiquer, à se faire confiance mutuellement et surtout à faire le deuil.
description.id: Shino Kishibe, seorang gadis yatim piatu tinggal bersama Kakak iparnya, Nozomi, semenjak Kakak kandungnya meninggal. Shino dan Nozomi menjalani hari-harinya dengan saling menguatkan satu sama lain.
description.ko: 키시베 시노, 고교생. 17세. 부모님이 돌아가신 뒤 유일한 가족이었던 오빠도 6개월 전 세상을 떠났습니다. 지금 저는 '오빠의 아내'인 '노조미 씨'와 살고 있습니다. 「타인이지만 가족」. 그런 두 사람의 조금은 불가사의하고, 서투르고, 조금은 행복을 깨닫게 하는 일상 감성 스토리.
description.ru: "Мои родители умерли давным-давно: погибли в автокатастрофе. После этого мы с братом жили вдвоем, до тех пор пока он…"

altTitles.ja: ロックマンさん

description.ar: بعد انتهاء القتال مع وايلي روكمان يخوض معركة جديدة كطبيب اسنان في العالم الحقيقي
description.en: Much time has passed since his battle with Dr. Wily, and Rockman has grown up in a peaceful world. Working as a dentist at the dental clinic opened by Dr. Right, Rockman struggles in his daily life with the allies he once fought with!
description.ja: Dr.ワイリーとの戦いから月日が経ち、ロックマンは平和な世の中で大人になった。ライト博士が開業した歯科医院で歯科医として働くロックマンは、かつて戦いを繰り広げた“仲間”とともに日々の生活で奮闘する!!

altTitles.ja: 外道の歌

description.en: The manga centers on Kamo and his partner Tora, who work in the underworld as "avengers for hire," taking on jobs from the victims of violent crimes and families seeking vengeance for wrongs done to them.

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

title.en: Granblue Fantasy: Bonds of the Twin Swords

altTitles.ja: グランブルーファンタジー　双剣の絆

description.en:
There was once a land by the name of Feendrache that was blessed by a primal beast. Upon the arrival of Gran and his companions Lyria and Vyrn, the kingdom becomes entwined in turmoil. With the aid of the Dragon Knights, they rush to save it from those who intend to plunge it into darkness.

An adaptation of the first two events/side stories in the "Dragon Knights" series from the mobile RPG *Granblue Fantasy*, Defender's Oath and Four Knights of a Fallen Land.

title.en: Zatsuyou Fuyo Jutsushi ga Jibun no Saikyou ni Kizuku made

altTitles.ja: 雑用付与術師が自分の最強に気付くまで

altTitles.en: Magical Buffs: The Support Caster Is Stronger Than He Realized!

description.en:
Wim Strauss is a "granting caster" - a support mage who can increase the strength of his allies through the power of his spells. It’s a useful talent, but since it can’t be used directly in battle, it gets zero respect from the other members of his party. As far as they’re concerned, support magic is dead weight. It isn’t long before they toss him out on his ear, leaving Wim to wonder if his career as an adventurer is over.

Luckily for Wim, he has one big chance: His childhood friend Heidemarie is able to get him an audition with her elite A-rank party, Nachtlibelle. The two of them know his magic is good for more than just menial backup, but now he’ll have to prove it. 

It’s time to show the world that support mages can do more than just stand on the back lines!

altTitles.en: I Made a Contract With Myself

description.en: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

title.en: The Villain Wants to Live One More Day

description.en: One day, Linghu Qiang suddenly acquired the "Villain's Counterattack" system and began his journey through various books. His mission was to survive, claim his rewards, and return to his original world. Being a villain was tough; several times, he encountered protagonists who launched missiles right from the start to kill him, or unparalleled sword immortals who, without a word, pierced his heart with a single strike before he could cause any trouble. In short, his success rate depended on what kind of villain he became.

altTitles.es: La Chica Malvada Se Convierte En Emperatriz

description.en:
The Goddess of War died with grievances. Now after being reborn as Ye Weiyun she is on her way to start a new and happy life.   
  
What revenge? What scum? Violence should be fought with violence!   
  
I will become a rich woman, and build my own harem.   
  
"In the past I got bullied and never resisted. Now, take a good look at the queen I have become."

[Alternative Official Raw: Kuaikan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5975)

title.en: Counterattacking System Available At The Grand Ascension Stage

altTitles.zh: Dacheng Qi Cai You Ni Xi Xitong

altTitles.en: Only in the Mahayana Period Does the Counterattack System Exist

description.en: Jiang Li, after crossing over, discovered he possessed no cheat abilities so he had no choice but to diligently cultivate. Five hundred years later, he became the strongest in the Nine Provinces. Suddenly, a system appeared, claiming it could help the host go from the Qi Refining stage to becoming the number one in the Nine Provinces. Jiang Li stared at the first task, lost in thought. “Host, please defeat your cousin (at the sixth level of Qi Refining).” “Your system seems to have quite a delay, doesn’t it?”

altTitles.ja: レベル200最強盗賊の覚醒～終末世界で暴れ狂ってやる～

description.en: A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.zh: 我成了反派大佬的小娇妻？！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我成了反派大佬的小嬌妻？！

altTitles.ja: 私は悪役の甘えん坊妻になりました

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Cheng Le Fan Pai Da Lao De Xiao Jiao Qi?!

description.en: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!

A Grim Reaper and a Witch go after a Cat that has escaped the Underworld.
See, when you're searching for a soul, you’re never sure what you will find. 


SHIN AGAMI is tasked by Director Minos to bring a Cat that has escaped the Underworld wanting one more life. But soon, Shin finds himself in deeper trouble than he thought. 
That’s when PEH. RSEPHONE, a young witch appears. And whenever a witch appears, things get interesting.
description.ja:
死神と魔女が冥界から逃げ出した猫を追う。
ほら、魂を探しているとき、何が見つかるかなんてわからないもの。

シン・アガミは、ミノス長官から、冥界から逃げ出し、もう一度命を欲しがっている猫を連れてくるよう命じられる。しかし、シンはすぐに、自分が思っていたよりも深刻な問題に巻き込まれる。
その時、若い魔女、ペ・ルセフォンが現れる。そして、魔女が現れるたびに、物事は面白くなる。

altTitles.ja: 聖母の断罪

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

title.en: Kuzu Rouninsei, Jinsei ga Tsurai no de Yoru no Onee-san wo Yondemita

altTitles.ja: クズ浪人生、人生が辛いので夜のお姉さんを呼んでみた

altTitles.en: A Scummy Gap Student With a Hard Life Calls Upon a Lady of the Night
Failed University Exams, I am Trash and Life is Hard, so I Tried Calling an Onee-san at Night

description.en: Makino failed her college entrance exam. Her only comfort is in her 2D game characters... until she found an ad for a call-girl who looked exactly like her favorite in-game waifu! The yuri love comedy between a gullible young woman and a street-wise call-girl begins now!
description.ja: 大学受験で大失敗した真希乃。唯一の癒しは二次元の推しだけ.....だったはずが、ふと広告に見つけてしまった──推しにそっくりな夜のお姉さんを！

altTitles.ja: 新米姉妹のふたりごはん

altTitles.zh: 百合姐妹的自炊双人餐

description.en:
"But suddenly, I had a little sister. That was the problem."

After her father's remarriage, Sachi suddenly has a new stepsister, Ayari. 
At first, their interactions are awkward and very brief. 
However, they soon discover a shared love… of food?

Sachi eventually discovers Ayari's passion for cooking, and the two step-sisters soon begin to bond over Ayari's delicious cooking, 
starting to overcome the barriers that had once kept them apart. 
While their parents are away on their honeymoon, they learn to cope with their differences and bond over a seemingly insignificant thing.
description.ja: 両親の再婚により、突然姉妹となったサチとあやり。言葉数が少なく目つきの鋭いあやりに対し、サチは物怖じし、これからの同居生活に大きな不安を感じてしまう。そんな時、海外出張中の父親から届いたのは生ハムの原木で──。料理を通じて絆を深めていく新米姉妹から目が目が離せない！ 幸せな笑顔はおいしい料理から生まれる、新鮮クッキングストーリー！

title.en: Hajime no Ippo - The First Step

altTitles.th: ก้าวแรกสู่สังเวียน

altTitles.ja: はじめの一歩

description.en:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
description.pt-br: Ippo Makunouchi, um tímido estudante de ensino médio, é um dia salvo se der espancado, por Takamura, um boxeador. Encantado pelas habilidade de Takamura e por vídeos de boxe, Ippo decide enfrentar o mundo profissional do boxe!

altTitles.en: I Became a Legendary Archmage by Reading a Book

description.en:
I was reincarnated as a grimoire containing all the magical knowledge of another world.

Anyone who reads me can become a legendary archmage.

Please, just read me...
But no one is willing to open my pages.

altTitles.ja: 和歌ちゃんは今日もあざとい

altTitles.en: A Hidden Side to my Crush

description.en: Tomoya is a college freshman on a mission to finally get his first ever girlfriend, but with one small problem: he's still a virgin! While he's gotten close with the beautiful and charming girl Waka Sakuraba in his club at school, he can't wrack up the courage to take the first step and ask her out. One day, Tomoya stumbles upon a hidden side to his crush Waka...
description.ja:
彼女を作ろうと意気込むDT（童貞）な大学１年生・友哉。同じサークルの癒やし系美少女・桜庭和歌と親しくなるものの、勇気が出ずなかなか第一歩を踏み出せずにいた。
そんなある日、友哉は和歌の「別の一面」を目撃してしまい…？

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

altTitles.ja: わからないです　吉田さん

description.en:
Tsukumo Yamada is a simple and unremarkable college student. 

As he is getting ready to go home after finishing his university lecture as usual, a solitary beautiful woman, Mao Yoshida, who is rumored to be a "mermaid princess," passes by. While the boys are in an uproar, Yamada is secretly summoned by Yoshida. When they are alone, Yoshida presses against him. In fact, Yamada and Yoshida have an intimate relationship... 

However, he is unable to grasp the romantic distance between them because Yoshida is too expressionless, and he is having a sweet but bittersweet college life, unable to go from "friend" to "lover".
description.ja: 地味で取柄もない大学生の九十九。大学の講義を終え帰宅準備をしていると孤高の美女「吉田真魚」が通りかかる。九十九と吉田さんは親密な関係なのだが、吉田さんが無表情すぎてなかなか関係が進展しないのだった…。
description.es-la: Tsukumo, un estudiante universitario ordinario y sin muchos atributos destacables, vive su día a día con tranquilidad. Pero un dia despues de finalizar sus clases y prepararse para regresar a casa, se cruza con Yoshida Mao, una hermosa y solitaria joven apodada la "Sirena". Entonces, mientras los demás chicos murmuran a su alrededor, Yoshida llama a Tsukumo en secreto. Al encontrarse a solas, Yoshida se acerca a él de manera inesperada. La realidad es que Tsukumo y Yoshida tienen una relación un tanto cercana. Sin embargo, Tsukumo lucha por comprender la distancia romántica entre ellos debido a la inexpresividad de Yoshida, lo que les impide pasar de ser "amigos" a "novios". Así, Tsukumo vive una vida universitaria dulce pero agridulce, intentando navegar entre la amistad y el amor. ¡¡Una serie de Takahashi osamu, autor de Lust Geass!!

altTitles.ja: 後藤さんは振り向かせたい

altTitles.en: Gotou-san Wants Me to Turn Around

altTitles.fr: Gotou-san veut que je me retourne

altTitles.es: Gotou-san Quiere Que me Dé la Vuelta.

description.en: Gotou-san, the prettiest girl in school, tries to get the attention of Maeda-kun, who sits in front of her. She secretly harbors a crush on him, but Maeda, who lacks self-confidence, doesn't notice her feelings. What is the future of Gotou-san's unwavering love?
description.es: La chica más guapa de la escuela, Gotou-san, siempre está tonteando con Maeda-kun, el chico sentado frente a ella. Ella está secretamente enamorada de él, pero Maeda-kun, que es inseguro de sí mismo, no entiende sus intenciones.
description.fr: Gotou-san, la plus jolie fille de l'école, demande quelque chose à Maeda-kun devant lui. Gotou-san l'aime secrètement, mais Maeda, qui ne lui fait pas confiance, ne la remarque pas.Quel est l'avenir de l'amour indéfectible de Gotou-san ?
description.ja:
その恋心に気付いてほしい！

学校一の美少女・後藤さんは前の席の前田くんになにかとちょっかいをかけてくる。そこには後藤さんの秘めたる恋心があるのだが、自分に自信のない前田君にはその意図は全く伝わらない。果たして後藤さんの一途な恋の行く末は？

altTitles.ja: 多重人格彼女

description.en: Narita doesn't believe in love at first sight, but when he meets a cute high school girl named Tsubasa, he falls for her immediately and even confesses to her. They both decide to start out as friends, but then she comes out and tells him the she has multiple personalities...!?
description.pt-br: Narita não acredita em amor à primeira vista, mas quando conhece uma linda colegial chamada Tsubasa, ele se apaixona por ela imediatamente e até se confessa a ela. Ambos decidem começar como amigos, mas então ela sai e diz a ele que ela tem múltiplas personalidades...!?

description.en:
This work contains controversial content such as violence and rape.

 Please be advised. Captain 'Leon Winston' of the National Intelligence Division of the Western Command of the Rippon Kingdom. Unlike his elegant and noble appearance, he was the object of both envy and damnation for both his allies and enemies, known as the "Vampire of Camden" who would torture the rebels cruelly.

"Every time I see you, I just want to thrust my gun in your tight space."

Strangely, the maid of the interrogation room "Sally Briston" became the object of his desires, as strong as the rage he has for the insurgent rebels. She was ordinary and nothing special... Perhaps it was simply the smell of blood on her that excited him.

The interrogation didn't take long.

He realized it as soon as he heard her name come out from the rebel spy's lips. He no longer needed to suppress his violent desires.

"I stopped myself from tormenting her because I thought she was a good girl, but now there's no need for that. Thank you, Sally. No... Grace."

If you want to live, then try begging.

You never know.

I might hear you out.
description.pt-br:
Esta obra contém conteúdo controverso, como violência e relações coercitivas, que podem ser polarizadores.

Por favor, esteja ciente de que você foi alertado.

Capitão Leon Winston do Comando Ocidental do Reino de Ripon, Divisão de Inteligência Doméstica. Apesar de sua aparência elegante e nobre, ele é conhecido como o "Vampiro de Campton" por sua tortura implacável aos rebeldes, tornando-o reverenciado e amaldiçoado tanto por aliados quanto por inimigos. 

"Eu sempre quis enfiar minha pistola na sua boceta apertada e brincar com ela." 

Curiosamente, a empregada da câmara de tortura, Sally Bristol, tornou-se objeto de seu desejo incontrolável, bem como a raiva que sentia pelos rebeldes. Ela era apenas uma mulher simples e comum... Então por que o cheiro do sangue dela continuava a excitá-lo? 

O mistério não durou muito. 

No momento em que o nome dela escapou dos lábios de um espião rebelde, ele percebeu. Ele não precisava mais reprimir seus desejos violentos. 

"Eu me contive porque não queria machucar uma menina boa, mas agora não há necessidade de me conter. Obrigado, Sally. Ah, não... Grace." 

Se quiser viver, implore. Nunca se sabe, talvez eu conceda o seu desejo.

altTitles.ja: マジンガーZ

description.en:
An alternate Mazinger Z manga by OUTA Gosaku. Not to be confused with the version by NAGAI Go.  
  
It has influence from the anime timeline of events.

title.en: Danzaisareta Akuyaku Reijou desu ga, Pan wo Yaitara Seijo ni Job Change Shimashita!?

altTitles.ja: 断罪された悪役令嬢ですが、パンを焼いたら聖女にジョブチェンジしました!?

description.en: Even spirits are enthralled by Tia's homemade bread! After being reincarnated into the world of a girls' game and finishing her punishment as the villainous lady, all that's left is to live freely!! Having exited the public eye as planned, Avaritia has taken up bread-making, a hobby of her previous life, and is working hard to spread its deliciousness to the people of the other world, who have only ever known hard, difficult-to-eat bread.

altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

Kayden é um agente secreto em fuga, que se encontra preso no corpo de um... hum... decididamente gordo velho gato fofo. title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.ja: 黙示録の四騎士

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

title.en: For You, I’ll Dress up in a Lie

altTitles.ja: 君のためにボクは嘘を着飾る

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no Tame ni Boku wa Uso wo Kikazaru

description.en: Kokuyou Yuzuru, a bit of a plain boy, is always together with his best friend from childhood, Shiratama Kotaro. They thought they could stay together forever even after they entered middle school... One day, something happens that changes their relationship drastically.
description.ja:
ちょっぴり地味な男子「黒曜結弦」は親友の幼馴染「白玉小太郎」といつも一緒。
中学生になってもずっと一緒にいられると思ったのに…。
ある日二人の関係を大きく変える出来事が起きる。

altTitles.ja-ro: Jijyou wo Shiranai Tenkousei ga Guigui Kuru

altTitles.pt: O Aluno Sem Noção Transferido É Assertivo

altTitles.ja: 事情を知らない転校生がグイグイくる。

altTitles.zh-hk: 什麼情況都不知道的轉校生一個勁的湊過來。

altTitles.uk: Цей безглуздий переведений учень такий настирливий.

altTitles.en: The Clueless Transfer Student Is Assertive.

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Primeiro Amigo é um Tapado

description.en: Akane Nishimura is a shy and gloomy elementary school girl with an unfounded dire reputation in her class due to her appearance. Taiyou Takada is a transfer student in her class who came from a small countryside school, and who is fascinated by the aspects of Nishimura that her classmates use to pick on her, finding her "darkness" cool beyond compare. Through the unbridled and fundamental joy Takada finds in being her friend, Nishimura starts realizing that being herself is not as bad as she thinks.
description.pt-br: Nishimura é uma garota retraída, hostilizada por todos os colegas por seu jeito sombrio, que dizem até que ela é a Morte em pessoa. Mas isso só chama ainda mais a atenção de Takada, um novo aluno transferido. Sem saber o motivo do apelido, que por sinal ele acha super-maneiro, Takada começa a se aproximar mais e mais da Nishimura para se tornar amigo dela. Uma história cativante, cheia de nostalgia dos nossos tempos de fundamental, sobre uma amizade que vai aquecer seus corações!

altTitles.ja: ローゼンガーテン・サーガ

description.en: Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert… I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat… ahem, heroes!
description.pt-br: Depois que sua vila foi atacada por um bando de ladrões, Lynn se levantou para proteger seus amigos e o mundo com a ajuda de uma Espada Mágica, que contém a alma de um herói...? Uma história de fantasia/ação com uma heroína sem precedentes(?)

altTitles.ja: 世にも過保護な魔王様

description.en:
Sena Yamada is a second-year in high school. For various reasons, she lives alone. She manages to get by by holding down a part-time job. One day, when she was about to be cheated out of her money, she was rescued by a demon king! He told her that she is a reincarnation of a saint and even asked her to move in with him...?　

The exciting life together of a hardworking JK and a pushy demon king is about to begin!

title.en: Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of Making My Cheeky Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

altTitles.es-la: El día que decidí hacer entender a mi descarada hermana gal a mi manera

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン
災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dan-Ex. During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server.
Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!
